title: TUNNEL / The Lost Diary
description: TUNNEL / The Lost DiaryIn a dark, musty, derelict coal mine tunnel, a young boy and an AWOL officer search for stolen Army pistols and a gold coins treasure. Over a decade later, they are hunted by foreign agents. A foreign country wants a diary stolen with the gold back.Gruesome killings in Forks, MO. What mystery does the diary hide? Is the deadly shootout in Chicago's 'The Four Seasons' hotel linked to it? Does the coded text hide the U.S. Government secrets? Will the text be aired on CNN?Read "TUNNEL / The Lost Diary," find out...NOTE: Like my other books, this book will be or is available in print and Kindle formats.
author: Steven Nedelton
